Spell.name: Acid Arrow
Spell.short_description: Ranged touch attack; 2d4 damage for 1 round + 1 round/three levels.

Spell.name: Acid Fog
Spell.short_description: Fog deals acid damage.

Spell.name: Acid Splash
Spell.short_description: Orb deals 1d3 acid damage.

Spell.name: Aid
Spell.short_description: +1 on attack rolls and saves against fear, 1d8 temporary hp +1/level (max +10).

Spell.name: Air Walk
Spell.short_description: Subject treads on air as if solid (climb or descend at 45-degree angle).

Spell.name: Align Weapon
Spell.short_description: Weapon becomes good, evil, lawful, or chaotic.

Spell.name: Alter Self
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, witch 2, summoner 2, alchemist 2, magus 2
Spell.short_description: Assume form of a Small or Medium humanoid.

Spell.name: Alarm
Spell.area: 20-ft.-radius emanation centered on a point in space
Spell.short_description: Wards an area for 2 hours/level.

Spell.name: Analyze Dweomer
Spell.short_description: Reveals magical aspects of subject.

Spell.name: Animal Growth
Spell.short_description: One animal doubles in size.

Spell.name: Animal Messenger
Spell.short_description: Sends a Tiny animal to a specific place.

Spell.name: Animal Shapes
Spell.short_description: One ally/level polymorphs into chosen animal.

Spell.name: Animal Trance
Spell.short_description: Fascinates 2d6 HD of animals.

Spell.name: Animate Dead
Spell.short_description: Creates undead skeletons and zombies.
Spell.mythic_text: Add your tier to your caster level when determining how many Hit Dice of undead you can animate with a single casting of this spell. This doesn't increase the total number of Hit Dice worth of undead you can control. By expending a second use of mythic power, you can ignore the spell's material component cost.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, any skeletons or zombies you create gain either the agile (see page 224) or savage (see page 224) mythic template. This template lasts for a number of days equal to your tier. Alternatively, if you're 8th tier and expend 10 uses of mythic power, any skeletons you create permanently gain the mythic skeleton template (see page 216).

Spell.name: Animate Objects
Spell.short_description: Objects attack your foes.
Spell.mythic_text: Animated objects you create with this spell get the maximum number of hit points per level, gain a +4 bonus to their Strength ability scores, and have 1-1/2 times the normal number of construction points.

Spell.name: Animate Plants
Spell.short_description: One or more plants animate and fight for you.
Spell.mythic_text: Animated plants you create with this spell get the maximum number of hit points per level, gain a +4 bonus to their Strength ability scores, and have 1-1/2 times the normal number of construction points.

Spell.name: Animate Rope
Spell.short_description: Makes a rope move at your command.

Spell.name: Antilife Shell
Spell.short_description: 10-ft.-radius field hedges out living creatures.

Spell.name: Antimagic Field
Spell.short_description: Negates magic within 10 ft.
Spell.mythic_text: Select a number of spell schools equal to half your tier. Spells and effects of the chosen schools are unaffected by the antimagic field.

Spell.name: Antipathy
Spell.short_description: Object or location affected by spell repels certain creatures.

Spell.name: Antiplant Shell
Spell.short_description: Keeps animated plants at bay.

Spell.name: Arcane Eye
Spell.short_description: Invisible floating eye moves 30 ft./round.

Spell.name: Arcane Lock
Spell.short_description: Magically locks a portal or chest.

Spell.name: Arcane Mark
Spell.short_description: Inscribes a personal rune on an object or creature (visible or invisible).

Spell.name: Arcane Sight
Spell.short_description: Magical auras become visible to you.

Spell.name: Arcane Sight, Greater
Spell.short_description: As arcane sight, but also reveals magic effects on creatures and objects.

Spell.name: Astral Projection
Spell.short_description: Projects you and others onto Astral Plane.

Spell.name: Atonement
Spell.short_description: Removes burden of misdeeds from subject.

Spell.name: Augury
Spell.short_description: Learns whether an action will be good or bad.

Spell.name: Awaken
Spell.short_description: Animal or tree gains human intellect.

Spell.name: Bane
Spell.short_description: Enemies take –1 on attack rolls and saves against fear.
Spell.mythic_text: The -1 penalty applies on attack rolls, weapon damage rolls, and all saving throws. Each affected creature must roll its next attack roll or saving throw twice and take the lower result.

Spell.name: Banishment
Spell.short_description: Banishes 2 HD/level of extraplanar creatures.

Spell.name: Barkskin
Spell.short_description: Grants +2 (or higher) enhancement to natural armor.
Spell.mythic_text: The target also gains DR/magic equal to the double the enhancement bonus the spell provides to the target's natural armor bonus.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the spell grants DR/epic rather than DR/magic.

Spell.name: Bear's Endurance
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 2, druid 2, ranger 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, summoner 2, alchemist 2, magus 2
Spell.short_description: Subject gains +4 to Con for 1 min./level.

Spell.name: Bear's Endurance, Mass
Spell.short_description: As bear’s endurance, affects 1 subject/level.

Spell.name: Beast Shape I
Spell.short_description: You take the form and some of the powers of a Small or Medium animal.

Spell.name: Beast Shape II
Spell.short_description: You take the form and some of the powers of a Tiny or Large animal.

Spell.name: Beast Shape III
Spell.short_description: You take the form of a Diminutive or Huge animal, or Small or Medium magical beast.

Spell.name: Beast Shape IV
Spell.short_description: You take the form of a Diminutive to Huge animal or a Tiny to Large magical beast.

Spell.name: Bestow Curse
Spell.short_description: –6 to an ability score; –4 on attack rolls, saves, and checks; or 50% chance of losing each action.

Spell.name: Binding
Spell.short_description: Utilizes an array of techniques to imprison a creature.

Spell.name: Black Tentacles
Spell.short_description: Tentacles grapple all creatures within a 20-ft. spread.
Spell.mythic_text: Add your tier to the base attack bonus of the tentacles. The tentacles also deal an additional 2d6 points of acid damage with a successful grapple.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the spell creates twice as many tentacles in the same area, meaning each creature in the area is attacked twice per round. The tentacles can grapple creatures that are immune to grappling if that immunity is from a non-mythic source, but combat maneuver checks to grapple such creatures take a -5 penalty.

Spell.name: Blade Barrier
Spell.short_description: Wall of blades deals 1d6/level damage.
Spell.mythic_text: You may cast this spell as an immediate action. The barrier's damage increases to 1d8 per caster level (maximum 20d8).
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, you can spend a move action to move the barrier up to 10 feet in any direction. The shape (flat or ring) and orientation (vertical or horizontal) of the wall must remain the same. If you move the barrier through a creature's space, it can attempt a saving throw to avoid the wall, as if you had created it where the creature is.

Spell.name: Blasphemy
Spell.area: nonevil creatures in a 40-ft.-radius spread centered on you
Spell.short_description: Kills, paralyzes, weakens, or dazes nonevil subjects.
Spell.mythic_text: When determining the spell's effect on non-mythic creatures, add your tier to your caster level. Nonevil creatures that fail the save take a -4 penalty on attack rolls and saving throws, and their spell resistance decreases by 5 for as long as the spell's other effects last.

Spell.name: Bleed
Spell.short_description: Cause a stabilized creature to resume dying.

Spell.name: Bless
Spell.area: The caster and all allies within a 50-ft. burst, centered on the caster
Spell.short_description: Allies gain +1 on attack rolls and saves against fear.
Spell.mythic_text: The +1 morale bonus applies on attack rolls, weapon damage rolls, and all saving throws. Once during the spell's duration, an affected creature can roll an attack roll or saving throw twice and take the higher result. The target must decide to use this ability before the first roll is attempted.

Spell.name: Bless Water
Spell.short_description: Makes holy water.

Spell.name: Bless Weapon
Spell.short_description: Weapon strikes true against evil foes.

Spell.name: Blight
Spell.short_description: Withers one plant or deals 1d6/level damage to plant creature.

Spell.name: Blindness/Deafness
Spell.short_description: Makes subject blind or deaf.
Spell.mythic_text: You can cause the target to be both blinded and deafened at the same time. The target must attempt a saving throw against each effect separately.

Spell.name: Blink
Spell.short_description: You randomly vanish and reappear for 1 round/level.
Spell.mythic_text: You may spend a move action to remain corporeal or incorporeal until the end of your turn (you automatically resume blinking at the end of your turn).
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, you can spend either a swift action or a move action to remain corporeal or incorporeal until the end of your turn.

Spell.name: Blur
Spell.short_description: Attacks miss subject 20% of the time.

Spell.name: Break Enchantment
Spell.spell_level: bard 4, cleric/oracle 5, paladin 4, sorcerer/wizard 5, witch 5, inquisitor 5
Spell.short_description: Frees subjects from enchantments, transmutations, and curses.
Spell.mythic_text: Against non-mythic effects, the spell automatically succeeds without requiring a caster level check. Against mythic effects, add your tier to your caster level check. The maximum level of spell this spell can remove is 5 + half your tier.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (7th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, you can apply a removed enchantment, transmutation, or curse to the creature that originally cast it. The creature must be a valid target of the spell and on the same plane as you, and it gets a saving throw at the effect's original DC.

Spell.name: Breath Of Life
Spell.short_description: Cures 5d8 damage + 1/level and restores life to recently slain creatures.
Spell.mythic_text: The spell heals 5d12 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +25). It can revive a creature that died of hp damage within the past 2 rounds. If the target was slain by a death effect that allows a saving throw, this spell allows the creature to attempt another save against that effect. If this save is successful, the creature is revived with -10 hp plus the amount healed by this spell.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (9th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, you can target up to one creature per caster level within 30 feet of you. Alternatively, you can target one creature that has been dead for a number of rounds up to your caster level.

Spell.name: Bull's Strength
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 2, druid 2, paladin 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, summoner 2, alchemist 2, antipaladin 2, magus 2
Spell.short_description: Subject gains +4 to Str for 1 min./level.

Spell.name: Bull's Strength, Mass
Spell.short_description: As bull’s strength, affects 1 subject/level.

Spell.name: Burning Hands
Spell.short_description: 1d4/level fire damage (max 5d4).
Spell.mythic_text: The range increases to 20 feet, and the damage dealt increases to 1d6 points of fire damage per caster level (maximum 5d6).

Spell.name: Call Lightning
Spell.short_description: Calls down lightning bolts (3d6 per bolt) from sky.
Spell.mythic_text: Each lightning bolt's damage increases to 3d10 points of damage (or 5d10 points outdoors in stormy weather). Half of this damage is electricity damage, and the other half is sonic. Creatures that succeed at their saving throws are dazzled and deafened for 1 round. Those that fail at their saving throws are dazzled and deafened for 1 minute.

Spell.name: Call Lightning Storm
Spell.short_description: As call lightning, but 5d6 damage per bolt.

Spell.name: Calm Animals
Spell.short_description: Calms 2d4 + level HD of animals.

Spell.name: Calm Emotions
Spell.short_description: Calms creatures, negating emotion effects.

Spell.name: Cat's Grace
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, druid 2, ranger 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, summoner 2, alchemist 2, magus 2
Spell.short_description: Subject gains +4 to Dex for 1 min./level.

Spell.name: Cat's Grace, Mass
Spell.short_description: As cat’s grace, affects 1 subject/level.

Spell.name: Cause Fear
Spell.spell_level: antipaladin 1, bard 1, cleric/oracle 1, inquisitor 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1
Spell.short_description: One creature of 5 HD or less flees for 1d4 rounds.

Spell.name: Chain Lightning
Spell.short_description: 1d6/level damage and 1 secondary bolt/level.
Spell.mythic_text: This spell deals 1d10 points of damage per caster level (maximum 20d10) and the save DC isn't reduced for secondary targets. Secondary targets have to be within 30 feet of any other target, not necessarily the primary target.

Spell.name: Changestaff
Spell.short_description: Your staff becomes a treant on command.
Spell.mythic_text: The treant-like creature created with this spell is considered a mythic creature, and it gains DR 10/epic and slashing instead of gaining DR 10/slashing.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (7th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the creature gains the savage mythic template (see page 224).

Spell.name: Chaos Hammer
Spell.short_description: Harms and slows lawful creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt to lawful outsiders increases to 1d10 points of damage per caster level (maximum 10d10), and the damage dealt to other lawful creatures increases to 1d12 points of damage per 2 caster levels (maximum 5d12). The duration of slow increases to 2d6 rounds. Lawful creatures that succeed at their saves are slowed for 1 round.

Spell.name: Charm Person
Spell.short_description: Makes one person your friend.

Spell.name: Charm Animal
Spell.short_description: Makes one animal your friend.

Spell.name: Charm Monster
Spell.short_description: Makes monster believe it is your ally.

Spell.name: Charm Monster, Mass
Spell.short_description: As charm monster, but all within 30 ft.

Spell.name: Chill Metal
Spell.short_description: Cold metal damages those who touch it.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 1d8 points of cold damage on rounds 2 and 6, and to 2d8 points of cold damage on rounds 3 through 5. Each round a creature takes cold damage from this spell, it also takes 1 point of Dexterity damage (Fortitude negates).

Spell.name: Chill Touch
Spell.short_description: One touch/level deals 1d6 damage and possibly 1 Str damage.

Spell.name: Circle Of Death
Spell.area: several living creatures within a 40-ft.-radius burst
Spell.short_description: Kills 1d4/level HD of creatures.
Spell.mythic_text: The number of Hit Dice worth of creatures killed by the spell increases to 1d6 per caster level (maximum 20d6). Add your tier to the maximum HD of creatures that can be affected by the spell. (For example, at 3rd tier, a creature with 12 HD cannot be affected.)
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, creatures that succeed at their saves against this spell take 1d6 points of damage per tier.

Spell.name: Clairaudience/Clairvoyance
Spell.short_description: Hear or see at a distance for 1 min./level.

Spell.name: Clenched Fist
Spell.short_description: Large hand provides cover, pushes, or attacks your foes.

Spell.name: Cloak of Chaos
Spell.short_description: +4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against lawful spells.

Spell.name: Clone
Spell.short_description: Duplicate awakens when original dies.

Spell.name: Cloudkill
Spell.short_description: Kills 3 HD or less; 4–6 HD save or die, 6+ HD take Con damage.
Spell.mythic_text: As a move action, you can move the cloud 10 feet in any direction. Add your tier to the spell's level and Hit Dice categories to determine its effect on creatures. (For example, at 3rd tier a creature with 6 or fewer HD gets no save, one with 7-9 HD must save or die, and one with 10 or more HD must save or take 1d4 points of Con damage.)
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the spell bypasses the poison immunity of living creatures.

Spell.name: Color Spray
Spell.short_description: Knocks unconscious, blinds, and/or stuns weak creatures.
Spell.mythic_text: The range increases to 30 feet. Add half your tier to the spell's Hit Dice categories to determine its effects on creatures. (At 3rd tier a creature with 3 or fewer HD is unconscious, blinded, and stunned; one with 4 or 5 HD is blinded and stunned, and one with 6 or more HD is stunned.) Creatures that succeed at their saves are dazzled for 1 minute.

Spell.name: Command
Spell.short_description: One subject obeys selected command for 1 round.
Spell.mythic_text: You can target up to one creature per level, each of which must receive the same command. Creatures that succeed at their saving throws are staggered for 1 round (this is a mind-affecting effect).

Spell.name: Command, Greater
Spell.short_description: As command, but affects one subject/level.

Spell.name: Command Plants
Spell.short_description: Sways the actions of plant creatures.

Spell.name: Command Undead
Spell.short_description: Undead creature obeys your commands.

Spell.name: Commune
Spell.short_description: Deity answers one yes-or-no question/level.

Spell.name: Commune with Nature
Spell.short_description: Learn about terrain for 1 mile/level.

Spell.name: Comprehend Languages
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, cleric/oracle 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1, inquisitor 1, alchemist 1
Spell.short_description: You understand all languages.

Spell.name: Cone of Cold
Spell.short_description: 1d6/level cold damage.

Spell.name: Confusion
Spell.short_description: Subjects behave oddly for 1 round/level.

Spell.name: Confusion, Lesser
Spell.short_description: One creature is confused for 1 round.

Spell.name: Consecrate
Spell.short_description: Fills area with positive energy, weakening undead.
Spell.mythic_text: The black pudding has fast healing equal to your tier, as do any puddings that split off from it. The black puddings from this spell never attack you, though they're otherwise uncontrolled and might attack your allies if there are no other obvious opponents.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the pudding gains the savage mythic template (see page 224). Puddings that split off from the giant pudding don't gain the template.

Spell.name: Contact Other Plane
Spell.short_description: Lets you ask question of extraplanar entity.

Spell.name: Contagion
Spell.short_description: Infects subject with chosen disease.
Spell.mythic_text: The affected target is highly contagious. Any creature it touches or that touches it with natural weapons or unarmed strikes must save or contract the disease. The save DC for these targets is equal to the spell's DC - 4. The target can't spread this disease to you.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (7th): If you expend five uses of mythic power, the spell targets every living creature within a 1-mile radius. You can select one creature per caster level within your line of sight; these creatures are unaffected by the spell.

Spell.name: Contingency
Spell.short_description: Sets trigger condition for another spell.
Spell.mythic_text: You can cast this spell on yourself or another willing creature as if the spell had a range of touch. A companion spell placed on another creature must be a spell from you, not from the creature, and affects that creature when triggered. The target can have only one contingency spell upon it at a time unless it also knows mythic contingency. The number of companion spells you can have on yourself is equal to 1 + half your tier.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (5th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the casting time changes to 1 full round plus the casting time of the companion spell, but the duration of mythic contingency decreases to 1 hour per level or until discharged.

Spell.name: Continual Flame
Spell.short_description: Makes a permanent, heatless light.

Spell.name: Control Plants
Spell.short_description: Controls actions of one or more plant creatures.

Spell.name: Control Undead
Spell.short_description: Undead don't attack you while under your command.

Spell.name: Control Water
Spell.area: water in a volume of 10 ft./level by 10 ft./level by 2 ft./level
Spell.short_description: Raises or lowers bodies of water.

Spell.name: Control Weather
Spell.area: 2-mile-radius circle, centered on you; see text
Spell.short_description: Changes weather in local area.
Spell.mythic_text: The casting time changes to 1 standard action, and the duration doubles. The weather changes after a number of rounds equal to 11 - your tier.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, you can create weather of any type regardless of the season, and the weather changes after 1 round.

Spell.name: Control Winds
Spell.short_description: Changes wind direction and speed.

Spell.name: Create Food and Water
Spell.short_description: Feeds three humans (or one horse)/level.

Spell.name: Create Undead
Spell.short_description: Create ghasts, ghouls, mohrgs, or mummies.

Spell.name: Create Greater Undead
Spell.short_description: Create shadows, wraiths, spectres, or devourers.

Spell.name: Create Water
Spell.short_description: Creates 2 gallons/level of pure water.

Spell.name: Creeping Doom
Spell.short_description: Swarms of centipedes attack at your command.

Spell.name: Crushing Despair
Spell.short_description: Subjects take –2 on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.

Spell.name: Crushing Hand
Spell.short_description: Large hand provides cover, pushes, or crushes your foes.

Spell.name: Cure Light Wounds
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, cleric/oracle 1, druid 1, paladin 1, ranger 2, witch 1, inquisitor 1, alchemist 1
Spell.short_description: Cures 1d8 damage + 1/level (max +5).
Spell.mythic_text: The damage cured increases to 2d8 points of damage + 2 points per caster level (maximum +10). The spell cures up to 1 point of ability damage if the target is a living creature. The target chooses what type of ability damage is cured.

Spell.name: Cure Critical Wounds
Spell.spell_level: bard 4, cleric/oracle 4, druid 5, witch 5, inquisitor 4, alchemist 4
Spell.short_description: Cures 4d8 damage + 1/level (max +20).
Spell.mythic_text: The damage cured increases to 8d8 points of damage + 2 points per caster level (maximum +40). The spell cures up to 4 points of ability damage if the target is a living creature. The target chooses what types of ability damage are cured.

Spell.name: Cure Light Wounds, Mass
Spell.short_description: Cures 1d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

Spell.name: Cure Critical Wounds, Mass
Spell.short_description: Cures 4d8 damage + 1/level for many creatures.

Spell.name: Cure Moderate Wounds
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, cleric/oracle 2, druid 3, paladin 3, ranger 3, witch 2, inquisitor 2, alchemist 2
Spell.short_description: Cures 2d8 damage + 1/level (max +10).
Spell.mythic_text: The damage cured increases to 4d8 points of damage + 2 points per caster level (maximum +20). The spell cures up to 2 points of ability damage if the target is a living creature. The target chooses what types of ability damage are cured.

Spell.name: Cure Moderate Wounds, Mass
Spell.short_description: Cures 2d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

Spell.name: Cure Serious Wounds
Spell.spell_level: bard 3, cleric/oracle 3, druid 4, paladin 4, ranger 4, witch 4, inquisitor 3, alchemist 3
Spell.short_description: Cures 3d8 damage + 1/level (max +15).
Spell.mythic_text: The damage cured increases to 6d8 points of damage + 2 points per caster level (maximum +30). The spell cures up to 3 points of ability damage if the target is a living creature. The target chooses what types of ability damage are cured.

Spell.name: Cure Serious Wounds, Mass
Spell.short_description: Cures 3d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

Spell.name: Curse Water
Spell.short_description: Makes unholy water.

Spell.name: Dancing Lights
Spell.short_description: Creates torches or other lights.

Spell.name: Darkness
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, cleric/oracle 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, inquisitor 2, antipaladin 2, magus 2
Spell.short_description: 20-ft. radius of supernatural shadow.
Spell.mythic_text: The illumination level in the area drops to darkness regardless of the existing lighting conditions. Non-mythic spells and effects can't increase the light level in the area. Creatures with darkvision and the power to see in darkness have difficulty seeing through this darkness, and can see as well as a human can in dim light. Creatures in the area of darkness take a -2 penalty on saves against fear.

Spell.name: Darkvision
Spell.short_description: See 60 ft. in total darkness.

Spell.name: Daylight
Spell.spell_level: bard 3, cleric/oracle 3, druid 3, paladin 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, inquisitor 3, magus 3
Spell.short_description: 60-ft. radius of bright light.
Spell.mythic_text: The illumination in the additional 60 foot radius increases to at least normal light regardless of the existing lighting conditions. Creatures that take penalties in bright light double those penalties while in the area of bright light produced by this spell. All other creatures in the area of bright light gain a +2 circumstance bonus on Perception checks and saves to resist fear.

Spell.name: Daze
Spell.spell_level: bard 0, sorcerer/wizard 0, witch 0, summoner 0, inquisitor 0, magus 0
Spell.short_description: Humanoid creature of 4 HD or less loses next action.

Spell.name: Daze Monster
Spell.short_description: Living creature of 6 HD or less loses next action.

Spell.name: Death Knell
Spell.duration: instantaneous/10 minutes per HD of subject; see text
Spell.short_description: Kills dying creature; you gain 1d8 temporary hp, +2 to Str, and +1 caster level.
Spell.mythic_text: Increase the spell's range to close (25 feet + 5 feet per 2 caster levels). Increase the temporary hp gained from the spell to 2d8 and the enhancement bonuses to Strength to +4, and gain a +4 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the casting time decreases to 1 immediate action, and you may target a creature that you killed on your last turn as if it were still alive; the dead target gets no save.

Spell.name: Death Ward
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 4, druid 5, paladin 4, witch 4, inquisitor 4, alchemist 4
Spell.short_description: Grants bonuses against death spells and negative energy.

Spell.name: Deathwatch
Spell.short_description: Reveals how near death subjects within 30 ft. are.

Spell.name: Deeper Darkness
Spell.short_description: Object sheds supernatural shadow in 60-ft. radius.

Spell.name: Deep Slumber
Spell.area: one or more living creatures within a 10-ft.-radius burst
Spell.short_description: Puts 10 HD of creatures to sleep.
Spell.mythic_text: This spell works like mythic sleep, except that it affects up to 20 Hit Dice of creatures. Alternatively, you may target one creature rather than an area, increasing the duration to 1 hour per level.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (5th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, creatures affected by the spell can be awakened only by mythic effects. If you're 5th tier and expend three uses of mythic power, the duration increases to 10 years per tier. If you're 5th tier and expend four uses of mythic power, the spell has both augmented effects. Creatures sleeping for years because of this spell age and breathe as normal, but don't need to eat or drink while the spell lasts.

Spell.name: Delayed Blast Fireball
Spell.short_description: 1d6/level fire damage; you can postpone blast for up to 5 rounds.

Spell.name: Delay Poison
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, cleric/oracle 2, druid 2, paladin 2, ranger 1, alchemist 2, witch 2, inquisitor 2
Spell.short_description: Stops poison from harming target for 1 hour/level.

Spell.name: Demand
Spell.short_description: As sending, plus you can send suggestion.

Spell.name: Desecrate
Spell.short_description: Fills area with negative energy, making undead stronger.
Spell.mythic_text: Select one alignment component that you have (chaotic, evil, or lawful). Outsiders with the opposite alignment subtype of the chosen alignment component take a -1 penalty on attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves in the area.

Spell.name: Destruction
Spell.short_description: Kills subject and destroys remains.

Spell.name: Detect Animals or Plants
Spell.short_description: Detects kinds of animals or plants.

Spell.name: Detect Chaos
Spell.short_description: Reveals creatures, spells, or objects of selected alignment.

Spell.name: Detect Evil
Spell.short_description: Reveals creatures, spells, or objects of selected alignment.

Spell.name: Detect Good
Spell.short_description: Reveals creatures, spells, or objects of selected alignment.

Spell.name: Detect Law
Spell.short_description: Reveals creatures, spells, or objects of selected alignment.

Spell.name: Detect Magic
Spell.spell_level: bard 0, cleric/oracle 0, druid 0, sorcerer/wizard 0, summoner 0, witch 0, inquisitor 0, magus 0
Spell.short_description: Detects spells and magic items within 60 ft.

Spell.name: Detect Poison
Spell.area: one creature, one object, or a 5-ft. cube
Spell.short_description: Detects poison in one creature or object.

Spell.name: Detect Scrying
Spell.short_description: Alerts you to magical eavesdropping.

Spell.name: Detect Secret Doors
Spell.short_description: Reveals hidden doors within 60 ft.

Spell.name: Detect Snares and Pits
Spell.short_description: Reveals natural or primitive traps.

Spell.name: Detect Thoughts
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, alchemist 2, summoner 2, witch 2, inquisitor 2
Spell.short_description: Allows “listening” to surface thoughts.

Spell.name: Detect Undead
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 1, paladin 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, alchemist 1, inquisitor 1, alchemist 1, inquisitor 1
Spell.short_description: Reveals undead within 60 ft.

Spell.name: Dictum
Spell.area: nonlawful creatures in a 40-ft.-radius spread centered on you
Spell.short_description: Kills, paralyzes, staggers, or deafens nonlawful targets.
Spell.mythic_text: When determining the spell's effect on non-mythic creatures, add your tier to your caster level. Nonlawful creatures that fail their saves against the spell also take a -4 penalty on attack rolls and saving throws, and their spell resistance decreases by 5 for as long as the spell's other effects last.

Spell.name: Dimensional Anchor
Spell.short_description: Bars extradimensional movement.

Spell.name: Dimensional Lock
Spell.area: 20-ft.-radius emanation centered on a point in space
Spell.short_description: Teleportation and interplanar travel blocked for 1 day/level.

Spell.name: Dimension Door
Spell.short_description: Teleports you a short distance.

Spell.name: Diminish Plants
Spell.short_description: Reduces size or blights the growth of normal plants.

Spell.name: Discern Lies
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 4, paladin 3, alchemist 4, witch 4, inquisitor 4, alchemist 4, witch 4, inquisitor 4
Spell.short_description: Reveals deliberate falsehoods.

Spell.name: Discern Location
Spell.short_description: Reveals exact location of creature or object.

Spell.name: Disguise Self
Spell.short_description: Changes your appearance.

Spell.name: Disintegrate
Spell.short_description: Reduces one creature or object to dust.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 3d6 points of damage per caster level (maximum 60d6) plus 1d4 points of Constitution damage. A creature that succeeds at its saving throw takes 5d8 points of damage plus 1 point of Constitution damage. A creature whose Constitution score is reduced to 0 by this spell is entirely disintegrated.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (7th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, you fire two rays. Alternatively, you may fire only one ray, but if the target is a non-mythic creature and it fails its saving throw, it's automatically disintegrated regardless of its current hp.

Spell.name: Dismissal
Spell.short_description: Forces a creature to return to native plane.

Spell.name: Dispel Chaos
Spell.duration: 1 round/level or until discharged, whichever comes first
Spell.short_description: +4 bonus against attacks by chaotic creatures.

Spell.name: Dispel Evil
Spell.duration: 1 round/level or until discharged, whichever comes first
Spell.short_description: +4 bonus against attacks by evil creatures.

Spell.name: Dispel Good
Spell.duration: 1 round/level or until discharged, whichever comes first
Spell.short_description: +4 against attacks by good creatures.

Spell.name: Dispel Law
Spell.duration: 1 round/level or until discharged, whichever comes first
Spell.short_description: +4 against attacks by lawful creatures.

Spell.name: Dispel Magic
Spell.spell_level: bard 3, cleric/oracle 3, druid 4, paladin 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner 3, witch 3, inquisitor 3, antipaladin 3, magus 3
Spell.short_description: Cancels one magical spell or effect.
Spell.mythic_text: When used as a targeted dispel, this spell can end two spells affecting the target instead of just one. If the targeted dispel successfully dispels at least one spell, you heal 1d4 points of damage for every spell level of the dispelled spell. If you dispel two spells, this healing applies only to the highest-level spell dispelled. If you use this spell to counterspell, roll your dispel check twice and take the higher result.

Spell.name: Dispel Magic, Greater
Spell.spell_level: bard 5, cleric/oracle 6, druid 6, sorcerer/wizard 6, witch 6, inquisitor 6, summoner 5, magus 6
Spell.short_description: Works as dispel magic, but can affect multiple targets.

Spell.name: Displacement
Spell.short_description: Attacks miss subject 50% of the time.

Spell.name: Disrupting Weapon
Spell.short_description: Melee weapon destroys undead.

Spell.name: Disrupt Undead
Spell.short_description: Deals 1d6 damage to one undead.

Spell.name: Divination
Spell.short_description: Provides useful advice for specific proposed actions.

Spell.name: Divine Favor
Spell.short_description: You gain +1 per three levels on attack and damage rolls.
Spell.mythic_text: You also gain the luck bonus on saving throws and skill checks. Alternatively, you can cast this spell on another willing creature, changing the range to touch and target to living creature touched.

Spell.name: Divine Power
Spell.short_description: You gain attack bonuses and 1 hp/level.

Spell.name: Dominate Animal
Spell.short_description: One animal obeys your silent mental commands and orders.

Spell.name: Dominate Monster
Spell.short_description: As dominate person, but any creature.

Spell.name: Dominate Person
Spell.short_description: Controls humanoid telepathically.

Spell.name: Doom
Spell.short_description: One subject takes –2 on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.

Spell.name: Dream
Spell.short_description: Sends message to anyone sleeping.
Spell.mythic_text: You or the messenger may gain information from the dreamer you contact by asking questions as if using speak with dead to speak with a corpse. An unwilling dreamer can attempt to resist this probing with a Will save (as speak with dead, using the DC dream would have if it allowed a saving throw). Answers to these questions are still generally brief and cryptic.

Spell.name: Eagle's Splendor
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, cleric/oracle 2, paladin 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, alchemist 2, summoner 2, antipaladin 2
Spell.short_description: Subject gains +4 to Cha for 1 min./level.

Spell.name: Eagle's Splendor, Mass
Spell.short_description: As eagle’s splendor, affects 1 subject/level.

Spell.name: Earthquake
Spell.short_description: Intense tremor shakes 80-ft. radius.
Spell.mythic_text: Increase the damage dealt to structures by 10 points of damage per tier. Increase the damage dealt by cave-ins and landslides to 10d8 points of damage. Increase the damage dealt to those pinned beneath rubble to 1d10 points per minute. Add your tier to the DC of concentration checks and Constitution checks attempted as a consequence of this spell.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (8th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the spell lasts for an additional round and the spread's radius increases by 20 feet. Each round this spell is in effect, on your turn you may expend one use of mythic power to continue its duration for 1 round and increase its radius by another 20 feet.

Spell.name: Elemental Body I
Spell.short_description: Turns you into a Small elemental.

Spell.name: Elemental Body II
Spell.short_description: Turns you into a Medium elemental.

Spell.name: Elemental Body III
Spell.short_description: Turns you into a Large elemental.

Spell.name: Elemental Body IV
Spell.short_description: Turns you into a Huge elemental.

Spell.name: Elemental Swarm
Spell.short_description: Summons multiple elementals.

Spell.name: Endure Elements
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 1, druid 1, paladin 1, ranger 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, alchemist 1, summoner 1
Spell.short_description: Exist comfortably in hot or cold regions.
Spell.mythic_text: The target changes to one creature touched per level. Affected creatures gain cold resistance 5 and fire resistance 5. They're not slowed by snow, and ignore penalties on Perception checks and ranged weapon attacks from hail, rain, sleet, and snow. They treat wind as one category weaker.

Spell.name: Energy Drain
Spell.short_description: Subject gains 2d4 negative levels.

Spell.name: Enervation
Spell.short_description: Subject gains 1d4 negative levels.
Spell.mythic_text: The number of negative levels inflicted increases to 1d6, and the target is sickened for 24 hours. An undead creature struck by the ray gains 1d6 x 5 temporary hit points for a number of hours equal to your caster level.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, any creature attempting to remove the target's negative levels must succeed at a caster level check (DC 10 + your caster level + your tier).

Spell.name: Enlarge Person
Spell.short_description: Humanoid creature doubles in size.
Spell.mythic_text: You can increase the target's size by up to two size categories, to a maximum of Huge. If the target grows two sizes, its weight increases by a factor of 25, it gains a +4 size bonus to Strength, and takes a -4 size penalty to Dexterity and a -2 penalty on attack rolls and to AC because of its increased size. A Medium humanoid creature whose size increases to Huge has a space of 15 feet and a natural reach of 10 feet. Mythic enlarge person counters and dispels mythic reduce person.

Spell.name: Enlarge Person, Mass
Spell.short_description: 1 humanoid creature/level doubles in size.

Spell.name: Entangle
Spell.short_description: Plants entangle everyone in 40-ft. radius.
Spell.mythic_text: The spell functions in areas without any vegetation, causing plants to spring up out of the ground. These plants can reach creatures that are up to 10 feet in the air. Plants affected or created by the spell sprout thorns that deal 1d6 points of damage each round to creatures in the area.

Spell.name: Enthrall
Spell.short_description: Captivates all within 100 ft. + 10 ft./level.

Spell.name: Entropic Shield
Spell.short_description: Ranged attacks against you have 20% miss chance.
Spell.mythic_text: When a ranged attack misses because of this spell, there is a 50% chance that the attack is redirected back at the attacker rather than just being deflected harmlessly. The attack uses the same result as the attack roll the attacker made against you.

Spell.name: Erase
Spell.short_description: Mundane or magical writing vanishes.

Spell.name: Ethereal Jaunt
Spell.short_description: You become ethereal for 1 round/level.

Spell.name: Etherealness
Spell.short_description: Travel to Ethereal Plane with companions.

Spell.name: Expeditious Retreat
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, alchemist 1, summoner 1, inquisitor 1, magus 1
Spell.short_description: Your base land speed increases by 30 ft.
Spell.mythic_text: The speed bonus from the spell increases to 40 feet. Add your tier to Acrobatics checks to avoid attacks of opportunity from movement, and when your movement provokes an attack of opportunity, add your tier to your AC against that attack.

Spell.name: Explosive Runes
Spell.short_description: Deals 6d6 damage when read.

Spell.name: Eyebite
Spell.short_description: Target becomes panicked, sickened, and/or comatose.

Spell.name: Fabricate
Spell.short_description: Transforms raw materials into finished items.

Spell.name: Faerie Fire
Spell.area: creatures and objects within a 5-ft.-radius burst
Spell.short_description: Outlines subjects with light, canceling blur, concealment, and the like.
Spell.mythic_text: Outlined creatures are dazzled. The spell outlines figment illusions in the burst, revealing them as such. This effect applies only to figments with a caster level equal to or less than your tier.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (2nd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, each creature in the burst must succeed at a Fortitude save or be blinded for 1 round.

Spell.name: False Life
Spell.duration: 1 hour/level or until discharged; see text
Spell.short_description: Gain 1d10 temporary hp + 1/level (max +10).

Spell.name: False Vision
Spell.short_description: Fools scrying with an illusion.

Spell.name: Feather Fall
Spell.short_description: Objects or creatures fall slowly.
Spell.mythic_text: The spell affects one additional target per level. The targets don't have to be within 20 feet of each other.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (4th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the spell absorbs the targets' velocity and transforms it into a concussive blast. Targets fall at the normal rate (not slowed) but land safely. When a target lands, it creates a 10-foot-radius burst of force that deals 1d6 points of damage per caster level (maximum 5d6, Reflex half, DC equal to the DC of feather fall). The targets of this spell are unaffected by these concussive blasts.

Spell.name: Feeblemind
Spell.short_description: Subject's Int and Cha drop to 1.

Spell.name: Find the Path
Spell.short_description: Shows most direct way to a location.

Spell.name: Find Traps
Spell.short_description: Notice traps as a rogue does.

Spell.name: Finger Of Death
Spell.short_description: Deals 10 damage/level to one subject.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 15 points of damage per caster level plus 1d8 points of Constitution damage. A creature that succeeds at its saving throw takes 3d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level, takes 1d4 points of Constitution damage, and is staggered for 1 round.

Spell.name: Fire Shield
Spell.short_description: Creatures attacking you take fire damage; you're protected from heat or cold.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt to your attackers increases to 1d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +15). A chill shield gives you fire immunity. A warm shield gives you cold immunity.

Spell.name: Fire Seeds
Spell.short_description: Acorns and berries become grenades and bombs.
Spell.mythic_text: Each acorn's damage increases to 1d6 points of fire damage per caster level (maximum 20d6 for all acorns, no more than 10d6 for any particular acorn). Each holly berry's damage increases to 2d6 points of fire damage + 2 points per caster level. Any creature that fails its Reflex save against an acorn or holly berry catches on fire (Core Rulebook 444), taking 2d6 points of fire damage each round until the fire is extinguished. Attempts to extinguish this fire use the spell's save DC.

Spell.name: Fire Storm
Spell.short_description: Deals 1d6/level fire damage.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 1d8 points of damage per caster level (maximum 20d8). Half of this damage is fire damage, and the other half is divine energy that bypasses fire resistance and fire immunity. You can exclude any number of animals from damage just as you can plant creatures.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (8th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, choose one creature type (and subtype, if humanoid or outsider) to exclude from the effects of the spell. For each additional use of mythic power you expend when casting the spell, exclude another creature type. For example, if you expend two uses of mythic power and choose magical beasts, you can exclude from damage any number of magical beasts in the spell's area.

Spell.name: Fire Trap
Spell.short_description: Opened object deals 1d4 + 1/level damage.

Spell.name: Fireball
Spell.short_description: 1d6 damage per level, 20-ft. radius.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 1d10 points of fire damage per caster level (maximum 10d10). Any creature that fails its Reflex saving throw catches on fire (Core Rulebook 444), taking 2d6 points of fire damage each round until the fire is extinguished. Attempts to extinguish this fire use the spell's save DC.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the maximum damage increases to 20d10, the area increases to a 40-foot radius spread, and any fire damage dealt by the spell bypasses fire resistance and fire immunity.

Spell.name: Flame Arrow
Spell.short_description: Arrows deal +1d6 fire damage.

Spell.name: Flame Blade
Spell.short_description: Touch attack deals 1d8 + 1/two levels damage.
Spell.mythic_text: The blade's damage increases to 2d6 points of fire damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +20). The blade threatens a critical hit on a natural 18-20 as if it were an actual scimitar.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the blade threatens a critical hit on a natural 15-20, and bypasses hardness, fire resistance, and fire immunity.

Spell.name: Flame Strike
Spell.short_description: Smites foes with divine fire (1d6/level damage).
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 1d8 per caster level (maximum 15d8). The area increases to a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder. You may have the divine half of the damage affect only one specific creature type (as the bane weapon quality).

Spell.name: Flaming Sphere
Spell.short_description: Rolling ball of fire deals 3d6 fire damage.

Spell.name: Flare
Spell.short_description: Dazzles one creature (–1 on attack rolls).

Spell.name: Flesh to Stone
Spell.short_description: Turns subject creature into statue.

Spell.name: Floating Disk
Spell.short_description: Creates 3-ft.-diameter horizontal disk that holds 100 lbs./level.

Spell.name: Fly
Spell.short_description: Subject flies at speed of 60 ft.
Spell.mythic_text: The fly speed changes to 120 feet (or 80 feet if the target is wearing medium or heavy armor, or carrying a medium or heavy load) with perfect maneuverability. When the duration expires, the target is protected by feather fall for a number of rounds equal to your caster level.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the target adds your tier on Reflex saves and as a dodge bonus to AC. It gains these bonuses only while flying.

Spell.name: Fog Cloud
Spell.short_description: Fog obscures vision.
Spell.mythic_text: The radius of the fog increases to 50 feet.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the fog's radius changes to 500 feet, and its height changes to 100 feet. Winds can't dissipate the fog unless the area of the wind affects the entire area of the augmented mythic fog cloud. If you're at least 6th tier and instead expend three uses of mythic power, the range increases to 1 mile, the fog's radius changes to 1 mile, and its height changes to 500 feet. The cloud is as resistant to wind as the 3rd-tier augmented version.

Spell.name: Forbiddance
Spell.short_description: Blocks planar travel, damages creatures of different alignment.

Spell.name: Forcecage
Spell.area: barred cage (20-ft. cube) or windowless cell (10-ft. cube)
Spell.short_description: Cube or cage of force imprisons all inside.

Spell.name: Forceful Hand
Spell.short_description: Hand pushes creatures away.

Spell.name: Foresight
Spell.short_description: “Sixth sense” warns of impending danger.
Spell.mythic_text: The spell's insight bonus increases to +3. If you cast the spell on another creature, you and the target are simultaneously warned by the spell, and the target gains the spell's insight bonuses.

Spell.name: Form of the Dragon I
Spell.short_description: Turns you into a Medium dragon.

Spell.name: Form of the Dragon II
Spell.short_description: Turns you into a Large dragon.

Spell.name: Form of the Dragon III
Spell.short_description: Turns you into a Huge dragon.

Spell.name: Fox's Cunning
Spell.short_description: Subject gains +4 to Int for 1 min./level.

Spell.name: Fox's Cunning, Mass
Spell.short_description: As fox’s cunning, affects 1 subject/level.

Spell.name: Freedom
Spell.short_description: Releases creature from imprisonment.

Spell.name: Freedom of Movement
Spell.spell_level: bard 4, cleric/oracle 4, druid 4, ranger 4, alchemist 4, inquisitor 4, alchemist 4, inquisitor 4
Spell.short_description: Subject moves normally despite impediments to restrict movement.

Spell.name: Freezing Sphere
Spell.short_description: Freezes water or deals cold damage.

Spell.name: Gaseous Form
Spell.short_description: Subject becomes insubstantial and can fly slowly.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage reduction changes to DR 10/epic and magic, and the fly speed increases to 30 feet. The target can expand itself as a free action, filling an area equal to double its normal space and height (a Medium creature fills a 10-foot-by-10-foot space to a height of about 10 feet) and blocking vision as obscuring mist. Returning from expanded to normal size is also a free action.
Spell.augmented: Augmented: If you expend two uses of mythic power, the target can shift into or out of gaseous form as a move action.

Spell.name: Gate
Spell.duration: instantaneous or concentration (up to 1 round/level); see text
Spell.short_description: Connects two planes for travel or summoning.

Spell.name: Geas/Quest
Spell.short_description: As lesser geas, but affects any creature.

Spell.name: Geas, Lesser
Spell.short_description: Commands subject of 7 HD or less.

Spell.name: Gentle Repose
Spell.short_description: Preserves one corpse.

Spell.name: Ghost Sound
Spell.short_description: Figment sounds.

Spell.name: Ghoul touch
Spell.short_description: Paralyzes one subject, which exudes stench that makes those nearby sickened.

Spell.name: Giant Form I
Spell.short_description: Turns you into a Large giant.

Spell.name: Giant Form II
Spell.short_description: Turns you into a Huge giant.

Spell.name: Giant Vermin
Spell.short_description: Turns centipedes, scorpions, or spiders into giant vermin.

Spell.name: Glibness
Spell.short_description: You gain +20 bonus on Bluff checks, and your lies can escape magical discernment.

Spell.name: Glitterdust
Spell.short_description: Blinds creatures, outlines invisible creatures.

Spell.name: Globe of Invulnerability, Lesser
Spell.short_description: Stops 1st- through 3rd-level spell effects.

Spell.name: Globe Of Invulnerability
Spell.short_description: As lesser globe of invulnerability, plus 4th-level spell effects.
Spell.mythic_text: Add half your tier to the level of non-mythic spells the globe excludes. The globe excludes mythic spells of 4th level or lower.

Spell.name: Glyph Of Warding
Spell.area: object touched or up to 5 sq. ft./level
Spell.short_description: Inscription harms those who pass it.
Spell.mythic_text: Add your tier to the DC to detect or disable the glyph. Blast glyph damage increases to 1d6 points of damage per caster level (maximum 20d6). Add half your tier to the maximum spell level you can store in a spell glyph.

Spell.name: Glyph of Warding, Greater
Spell.area: object touched or up to 5 sq. ft./level
Spell.short_description: As glyph of warding, but up to 10d8 damage or 6th-level spell.

Spell.name: Goodberry
Spell.short_description: 2d4 berries each cure 1 hp (max 8 hp/24 hours).

Spell.name: Good Hope
Spell.short_description: Subjects gain +2 on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.

Spell.name: Grasping Hand
Spell.short_description: Hand provides cover, pushes, or grapples.

Spell.name: Grease
Spell.short_description: Makes 10-ft. square or one object slippery.
Spell.mythic_text: If you cast mythic grease on an area, add your tier to the Acrobatics DC to move within or through the area. If you cast it on a creature's armor or clothing, add your tier to its Escape Artist checks and combat maneuver checks attempted to escape a grapple and to its CMD to avoid being grappled.
Spell.augmented: Augmented: You can expend two uses of mythic power to make the grease flammable. It ignites from any fire at least the size of a candle flame. If a greased area is ignited, any creature in the area on your turn takes 1d3 points of fire damage and might catch on fire (Core Rulebook 444). If a greased creature is ignited, it takes 2d6 points of fire damage, and might catch on fire; add your tier to the save DC.

Spell.name: Guards and Wards
Spell.short_description: Array of magic effects protect area.

Spell.name: Guidance
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 0, druid 0, summoner 0, witch 0, inquisitor 0, summoner 0, witch 0, inquisitor 0
Spell.short_description: +1 on one attack roll, saving throw, or skill check.

Spell.name: Gust Of Wind
Spell.short_description: Blows away or knocks down smaller creatures.
Spell.mythic_text: The force of the wind increases to windstorm (approximately 70 mph; Core Rulebook 439). All effects described in the spell affect creatures one size larger. Ranged attacks can't be attempted in the area of the spell. The wind automatically blows out unprotected flames and has a 75% chance of blowing out protected flames.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (2nd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the spell lasts for 1 additional round and the range increases by 30 feet. As a swift action at the start of your turn, you can expend another use of mythic power to extend the duration by 1 round and the range by another 30 feet.

Spell.name: Hallow
Spell.area: 40-ft. radius emanating from the touched point
Spell.short_description: Designates location as holy.

Spell.name: Hallucinatory Terrain
Spell.short_description: Makes one type of terrain appear like another (field as forest, or the like).

Spell.name: Halt Undead
Spell.short_description: Immobilizes undead for 1 round/level.

Spell.name: Harm
Spell.short_description: Deals 10 points/level damage to target.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 15 points of damage per caster level (maximum 225 points).
Spell.augmented: Augmented: If you expend two uses of mythic power, the spell also acts as poison.

Spell.name: Haste
Spell.short_description: One creature/level moves faster, receives +1 on attack rolls, AC, and Reflex saves.
Spell.mythic_text: Affected creatures gain an additional move action each round. The movement speed increase changes to 50 feet, to a maximum of three times the creature's normal speed for that movement type.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the movement speed increase changes to 70 feet, with no limit based on the creature's normal speed. If an affected creature moves at least 30 feet on its turn, it can travel across liquid as if the liquid were solid. If the liquid deals damage on contact, the creature takes only half damage from moving across it.

Spell.name: Heal
Spell.short_description: Cures 10 points/level damage, all diseases and mental conditions.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage cured increases to 15 points of damage per caster level (maximum 225 points).
Spell.augmented: Augmented: If you expend two uses of mythic power, the spell also acts as restoration.

Spell.name: Heal, Mass
Spell.short_description: As heal, but affects 1 subject/level.

Spell.name: Heal Mount
Spell.short_description: As heal on horse or other special mount.

Spell.name: Heat Metal
Spell.short_description: Makes metal so hot it damages those who touch it.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 1d8 points of fire damage on rounds 2 and 6 and to 2d8 points of fire damage per round on rounds 3 through 5. On any round in which a creature takes fire damage from this spell, that creature must succeed at a Reflex save or catch on fire (Core Rulebook 444).

Spell.name: Helping Hand
Spell.short_description: Ghostly hand leads subject to you.

Spell.name: Heroes' Feast
Spell.short_description: Food for one creature/level cures and grants combat bonuses.

Spell.name: Heroism
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, sorcerer/wizard 3, alchemist 3, summoner 3, witch 3, inquisitor 3
Spell.short_description: Gives +2 on attack rolls, saves, skill checks.
Spell.mythic_text: The morale bonus increases to +4 and applies on all checks, attack rolls, saves, and weapon damage rolls. Allies adjacent to the target gain a +4 morale bonus on saves against fear effects.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the target can attempt one additional attack per round when taking a full attack action (as if using a haste spell). The target can use this additional attack ability a number of times equal to your tier.

Spell.name: Heroism, Greater
Spell.short_description: Gives +4 bonus on attack rolls, saves, skill checks; immunity to fear; temporary hp.

Spell.name: Hide from Animals
Spell.short_description: Animals can’t perceive one subject/level.

Spell.name: Hide from Undead
Spell.short_description: Undead can't perceive one subject/level.

Spell.name: Hideous Laughter
Spell.short_description: Subject loses actions for 1 round/ level.

Spell.name: Hold Person
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, cleric/oracle 2, sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 2, inquisitor 2, antipaladin 2
Spell.short_description: Paralyzes one humanoid for 1 round/level.

Spell.name: Hold Monster
Spell.spell_level: bard 4, sorcerer/wizard 5, summoner 4, witch 5, inquisitor 4, summoner 4, witch 5, inquisitor 4
Spell.short_description: As hold person, but any creature.

Spell.name: Hold Monster, Mass
Spell.short_description: As hold monster, but all within 30 ft.

Spell.name: Hold Person, Mass
Spell.short_description: As hold person, but all within 30 ft.

Spell.name: Hold Portal
Spell.short_description: Holds door shut.
Spell.mythic_text: The target portal can be as large as 30 square feet per caster level. A creature attempting to force open the portal must first succeed at a Will save against the spell's DC. This is a mind-affecting effect. Failure means the creature can't open the door while the spell is in effect.

Spell.name: Holy Aura
Spell.short_description: +4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against evil spells.

Spell.name: Holy Smite
Spell.short_description: Harms and possibly blinds evil creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt to evil outsiders increases to 1d10 points of damage per caster level (maximum 10d10) and the damage dealt to other evil creatures increases to 1d12 points of damage per 2 caster levels (maximum 5d12). The duration that creatures in the area are blinded increases to 2 rounds. On a successful save, an evil creature is blinded for 1 round.

Spell.name: Holy Sword
Spell.short_description: Weapon becomes +5, deals +2d6 damage against evil.

Spell.name: Holy Word
Spell.area: nongood creatures in a 40-ft.-radius spread centered on you
Spell.short_description: Kills, paralyzes, blinds, or deafens nongood subjects.
Spell.mythic_text: When determining the spell's effect on non-mythic creatures, add your tier to your caster level. Nongood creatures that fail their saves also take a -4 penalty on attack rolls and saving throws, and their spell resistance decreases by 5 for as long as the spell's other effects last.

Spell.name: Horrid Wilting
Spell.short_description: Deals 1d6/level damage within 30 ft.

Spell.name: Hypnotic Pattern
Spell.short_description: Fascinates (2d4 + level) HD of creatures.

Spell.name: Hypnotism
Spell.area: several living creatures, no two of which may be more than 30 ft. apart
Spell.short_description: Fascinates 2d4 HD of creatures.

Spell.name: Ice Storm
Spell.short_description: Hail deals 5d6 damage in cylinder 40 ft. across.
Spell.mythic_text: The bludgeoning damage increases to 4d8 points of damage and the cold damage increases to 3d6 points of damage. The ground in the area is covered in ice and hailstones, acting as though a grease spell were cast on it. Dealing 5 or more points of fire damage to a square melts the ice and hail, negating the grease effect.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, one creature in the area is paralyzed (as if by hold person) and gains vulnerability to fire as long as it's paralyzed.

Spell.name: Identify
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, alchemist 1, summoner 1, witch 1, alchemist 1, summoner 1, witch 1
Spell.short_description: Gives +10 bonus to identify magic items.

Spell.name: Illusory Script
Spell.short_description: Only select creatures can read text.

Spell.name: Illusory Wall
Spell.short_description: Wall, floor, or ceiling looks real, but anything can pass through.

Spell.name: Imbue with Spell Ability
Spell.short_description: Transfer spells to subject.

Spell.name: Implosion
Spell.short_description: Inflict 10 damage/level to one creature/round.

Spell.name: Imprisonment
Spell.short_description: Entombs subject beneath the earth.

Spell.name: Incendiary Cloud
Spell.area: cloud spreads in 20-ft. radius, 20 ft. high
Spell.short_description: Cloud deals 6d6 fire damage/round.

Spell.name: Inflict Light Wounds
Spell.short_description: Touch deals 1d8 damage +1/level (max +5).
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 2d8 points of damage + 2 points per caster level (maximum +10). A living target is sickened for 1 round per caster level (maximum 5 rounds) if it fails its saving throw.

Spell.name: Inflict Critical Wounds
Spell.short_description: Touch attack, 4d8 damage + 1/level (max +20).
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 8d8 points of damage + 2 points per caster level (maximum +40). A living target is sickened for 1 round per caster level (maximum 20 rounds) if it fails its saving throw.

Spell.name: Inflict Critical Wounds, Mass
Spell.short_description: Deals 4d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

Spell.name: Inflict Light Wounds, Mass
Spell.short_description: Deals 1d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

Spell.name: Inflict Moderate Wounds
Spell.short_description: Touch attack, 2d8 damage + 1/level (max +10).
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 4d8 points of damage + 2 points per caster level (maximum +20). A living target is sickened for 1 round per caster level (maximum 10 rounds) if it fails its saving throw.

Spell.name: Inflict Moderate Wounds, Mass
Spell.short_description: Deals 2d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

Spell.name: Inflict Serious Wounds
Spell.short_description: Touch attack, 3d8 damage + 1/level (max +15).
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 6d8 points of damage + 2 points per caster level (maximum +30). A living target is sickened for 1 round per caster level (maximum 15 rounds) if it fails its saving throw.

Spell.name: Inflict Serious Wounds, Mass
Spell.short_description: Deals 3d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

Spell.name: Insanity
Spell.short_description: Subject suffers continuous confusion.

Spell.name: Interposing Hand
Spell.short_description: Hand provides cover against 1 opponent.

Spell.name: Invisibility
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, alchemist 2, summoner 2, inquisitor 2, antipaladin 2, magus 2
Spell.short_description: Subject is invisible for 1 min./level or until it attacks.
Spell.mythic_text: The invisible target can't be detected with detect magic or other spells that detect magic auras. The invisibility can't be penetrated, revealed, or dispelled by spells of 2nd level or lower (such as see invisibility or glitterdust), though true seeing and dust of appearance can reveal the invisible target's presence.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the invisible target is undetectable by blindsense, blindsight, scent, and tremorsense.

Spell.name: Invisibility, Greater
Spell.spell_level: bard 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, alchemist 4, summoner 3, inquisitor 4, antipaladin 4
Spell.short_description: As invisibility, but subject can attack and stay invisible.

Spell.name: Invisibility, Mass
Spell.short_description: As invisibility, but affects all in range.

Spell.name: Invisibility Purge
Spell.short_description: Dispels invisibility within 5 ft./level.

Spell.name: Invisibility Sphere
Spell.short_description: Makes everyone within 10 feet invisible.

Spell.name: Iron Body
Spell.short_description: Your body becomes living iron.

Spell.name: Ironwood
Spell.short_description: Magic wood is as strong as steel.

Spell.name: Irresistible Dance
Spell.short_description: Forces subject to dance.

Spell.name: Jump
Spell.spell_level: druid 1, ranger 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, alchemist 1, summoner 1, alchemist 1, summoner 1, magus 1
Spell.short_description: Subject gets bonus on Acrobatics checks.

Spell.name: Keen Edge
Spell.short_description: Doubles normal weapon's threat range.

Spell.name: Knock
Spell.short_description: Opens locked or magically sealed door.

Spell.name: Know Direction
Spell.short_description: You discern north.

Spell.name: Legend Lore
Spell.short_description: Lets you learn tales about a person, place, or thing.

Spell.name: Levitate
Spell.short_description: Subject moves up and down at your direction.

Spell.name: Light
Spell.spell_level: bard 0, cleric/oracle 0, druid 0, inquisitor 0, magus 0, sorcerer/wizard 0, summoner 0, witch 0
Spell.short_description: Object shines like a torch.

Spell.name: Lightning Bolt
Spell.short_description: Electricity deals 1d6/level damage.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 1d8 points of electricity damage per caster level (maximum 10d8). Any creature that fails its save is staggered for 1 round.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, you can bend the line of the spell once up to 90 degrees. Any creature that fails its save is stunned for 1 round.

Spell.name: Limited Wish
Spell.short_description: Alters reality (within limits).
Spell.mythic_text: When using mythic limited wish to duplicate another spell, you can duplicate a mythic spell you know (if you're a spontaneous caster) or have prepared (if you're a caster who prepares spells). If you don't know or haven't prepared the mythic spell, you can expend a second use of mythic power duplicate the mythic version of the desired spell.
Spell.augmented: Augmented: If you expend two uses of mythic power, you can cast a silent, stilled mythic limited wish, even if you're helpless or couldn't otherwise take actions (but not unconscious).

Spell.name: Liveoak
Spell.short_description: Oak becomes treant guardian.

Spell.name: Locate Object
Spell.area: circle, centered on you, with a radius of 400 ft. + 40 ft./level
Spell.short_description: Senses direction toward object (specific or type).

Spell.name: Locate Creature
Spell.area: circle, centered on you, with a radius of 400 ft. + 40 ft./level
Spell.short_description: Indicates direction to known creature.

Spell.name: Longstrider
Spell.short_description: Your speed increases by 10 ft.

Spell.name: Lullaby
Spell.short_description: Makes subject drowsy –5 on Perception checks, –2 on Will saves against sleep.

Spell.name: Mage Armor
Spell.short_description: Gives subject +4 armor bonus.
Spell.mythic_text: The armor bonus increases to +6. There is a 50% chance that any critical hit or sneak attack made against the target is negated and treated as a normal hit, as if the target were wearing moderate fortification armor.

Spell.name: Mage Hand
Spell.short_description: 5-pound telekinesis.

Spell.name: Mage's Disjunction
Spell.area: all magical effects and magic items within a 40-ft.-radius burst, or one magic item (see text)
Spell.short_description: Dispels magic, disenchants magic items.
Spell.mythic_text: The duration increases to 10 minutes per caster level. The chance to destroy an antimagic field increases to 2% per caster level.

Spell.name: Mage's Faithful Hound
Spell.duration: 1 hour/caster level or until discharged, then 1 round/caster level; see text
Spell.short_description: Phantom dog can guard a location and attack intruders.

Spell.name: Mage's Lucubration
Spell.short_description: Wizard only. Recalls spell of 5th level or lower.

Spell.name: Mage's Magnificent Mansion
Spell.short_description: Door leads to extradimensional mansion.

Spell.name: Mage's Private Sanctum
Spell.short_description: Prevents anyone from viewing or scrying an area for 24 hours.

Spell.name: Mage's Sword
Spell.short_description: Floating magic blade strikes opponents.

Spell.name: Magic Aura
Spell.short_description: Alters object’s magic aura.

Spell.name: Magic Circle against Evil
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 3, paladin 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner 3, inquisitor 3, summoner 3, inquisitor 3
Spell.short_description: As protection spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.

Spell.name: Magic Circle against Chaos
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 3, paladin 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner 3, inquisitor 3, summoner 3, inquisitor 3
Spell.short_description: As protection spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.

Spell.name: Magic Circle against Good
Spell.short_description: As protection spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.

Spell.name: Magic Circle against Law
Spell.short_description: As protection spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.

Spell.name: Magic Fang
Spell.short_description: One natural weapon of subject creature gets +1 on attack and damage rolls.
Spell.mythic_text: The spell affects an additional number of the target's natural weapons equal to your tier. For example, if you're 3rd tier, it could affect two claws and one bite).

Spell.name: Magic Fang, Greater
Spell.short_description: One natural weapon gets + 1/four levels (max +5).

Spell.name: Magic Jar
Spell.duration: 1 hour/level or until you return to your body
Spell.short_description: Enables possession of another creature.

Spell.name: Magic Missile
Spell.short_description: 1d4+1 damage; +1 missile per two levels above 1st (max 5).
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt by each missile increases to 2d4+1. The missiles bypass the shield spell and similar effects that block the non-mythic version of this spell.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (4th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the spell creates double the normal number of missiles (affecting up to 10 creatures), its range increases to line of sight, and it bypasses the targets' spell resistance and spell immunity.

Spell.name: Magic Mouth
Spell.short_description: Objects speaks once when triggered.

Spell.name: Magic Stone
Spell.short_description: Three stones gain +1 on attack, deal 1d6 +1 damage.

Spell.name: Magic Vestment
Spell.short_description: Armor or shield gains +1 enhancement per four levels.
Spell.mythic_text: You can add one armor special ability to the target if it's armor or one shield special ability if it's a shield. The special ability must have a base price modifier no greater than a +1 enhancement bonus or 4,000 gp.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, you can add any number of special abilities with a total base price modifier no greater than a +2 enhancement bonus or 15,000 gp.

Spell.name: Magic Weapon
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 1, paladin 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, inquisitor 1, antipaladin 1, magus 1
Spell.short_description: Weapon gains +1 bonus.

Spell.name: Magic Weapon, Greater
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 4, paladin 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, inquisitor 3, antipaladin 3, magus 3
Spell.short_description: Weapon gains +1 bonus/four levels (max +5).
Spell.mythic_text: You can add one of the following weapon special abilities to the weapon: flaming, frost, keen, merciful, shock, or thundering.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (5th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, you can reduce the granted enhancement bonus by 1 to add two of the above abilities or one of the following abilities: anarchic, axiomatic, flaming burst, holy, icy burst, shocking burst, or unholy.

Spell.name: Minor Creation
Spell.short_description: Creates one cloth or wood object.

Spell.name: Major Creation
Spell.short_description: As minor creation, plus stone and metal.

Spell.name: Major Image
Spell.short_description: As silent image, plus sound, smell, and thermal effects.

Spell.name: Make Whole
Spell.short_description: Repairs an object.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage the spell repairs increases to 2d6 points of damage per caster level when cast on a construct creature (maximum 10d6). A construct repaired with this spell gains a +2 enhancement bonus on an ability score of your choice for the next 24 hours. To repair a magic item, your caster level has to equal to only the caster level of the magic item, not double the caster level.

Spell.name: Mark of Justice
Spell.short_description: Designates action that triggers curse on subject.

Spell.name: Maze
Spell.short_description: Traps subject in extradimensional maze.
Spell.mythic_text: A spectral minotaur hunts the target trapped in the maze. Every round the creature fails to escape from the maze, it takes 2d8 + your tier points of piercing and slashing damage from this phantom opponent.

Spell.name: Meld into Stone
Spell.short_description: You and your gear merge with stone.

Spell.name: Mending
Spell.spell_level: bard 0, cleric/oracle 0, druid 0, sorcerer/wizard 0, summoner 0, witch 0, summoner 0, witch 0
Spell.short_description: Makes minor repairs on an object.

Spell.name: Message
Spell.short_description: Whisper conversation at distance.

Spell.name: Meteor Swarm
Spell.short_description: Four exploding spheres each deal 6d6 fire damage.
Spell.mythic_text: The meteors created by this spell deal bludgeoning damage in a line extending from you to the target destination where it explodes. Creatures in the path of a meteor take 2d10 points of bludgeoning damage and must succeed at a Fortitude save or be knocked prone. The damage from the exploding meteors increases to 6d10 points of fire damage. Creatures that fail their Reflex saves against the fire damage are also knocked prone and deafened for 1d4 rounds.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (10th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, creatures in the path of a meteor also take 4d10 points of fire damage and the damage from the exploding meteors increases to 10d10 points of fire damage; this fire damage bypasses fire resistance and fire immunity.

Spell.name: Mind Blank
Spell.short_description: Subject is protected from mental/emotional magic and scrying.

Spell.name: Mind Fog
Spell.short_description: Subjects in fog get –10 to Wis and Will checks.

Spell.name: Minor Image
Spell.short_description: As silent image, plus some sound.

Spell.name: Miracle
Spell.short_description: Requests a deity's intercession.

Spell.name: Mirage Arcana
Spell.short_description: As hallucinatory terrain, plus structures.

Spell.name: Mirror Image
Spell.short_description: Creates decoy duplicates of you (1d4 + 1 per three levels, max 8).
Spell.mythic_text: The maximum number of images generated by this spell increases to 12. Destroying an image creates a flash of light. Any creature that destroys an image must succeed at a Will save or be dazzled for 1 round.

Spell.name: Misdirection
Spell.short_description: Misleads divinations for one creature or object.

Spell.name: Mislead
Spell.duration: 1 round/level (D) and concentration + 3 rounds; see text
Spell.short_description: Turns you invisible and creates illusory double.
Spell.mythic_text: You create one illusory double per 5 caster levels, each of which appears in your square or in an unoccupied square adjacent to yours. When you cast the spell, you can give each of these doubles a simple programmed task as a telepathic command, such a "walk south," "beg for mercy," or "follow that troll." You can change or modify a single illusory double's programmed task by spending a swift, move, or standard action; this requires concentration.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (4th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, this spell also grants you the benefits of augmented mythic invisibility instead of greater invisibility.

Spell.name: Mnemonic Enhancer
Spell.short_description: Wizard only. Prepare extra spells or retain one just cast.

Spell.name: Modify Memory
Spell.short_description: Changes 5 minutes of subject's memories.

Spell.name: Moment of Prescience
Spell.short_description: You gain +1/level insight bonus on single attack roll, check, or save.

Spell.name: Mount
Spell.short_description: Summons riding horse for 2 hours/level.

Spell.name: Move Earth
Spell.area: dirt in an area up to 750 ft. square and up to 10 ft. deep (S)
Spell.short_description: Digs trenches and builds hills.
Spell.mythic_text: This spell can move earth much more quickly, with each full round of casting allowing you to reshape a 25-foot-square area up to 10 feet deep. All creatures on or under the ground within that area are knocked prone and moved to the closest square outside the area being shaped. A successful Reflex save prevents a creature from being knocked prone, but it's still moved.

Spell.name: Neutralize Poison
Spell.spell_level: bard 4, cleric/oracle 4, druid 3, paladin 4, ranger 3, alchemist 4, witch 4, inquisitor 4
Spell.short_description: Immunizes subject against poison, detoxifies venom in or on subject.

Spell.name: Nightmare
Spell.short_description: Sends vision dealing 1d10 damage, fatigue.
Spell.mythic_text: The spell's damage increases to 4d6 points of damage, and the target is also shaken for 24 hours.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): You can deliver a mind-affecting spell through a mythic nightmare. The maximum level of the delivered spell is equal to half your tier, and you must expend one use of mythic power for each spell level of the imbued spell in addition to the one use needed to cast mythic nightmare. You choose whether the delivered spell affects the creature immediately or when it awakens. The delivered spell affects only the target, even if it normally affects multiple creatures or an area.

Spell.name: Nondetection
Spell.spell_level: ranger 4, sorcerer/wizard 3, alchemist 3, summoner 3, inquisitor 3, antipaladin 3
Spell.short_description: Hides subject from divination, scrying.

Spell.name: Obscure Object
Spell.short_description: Masks object against scrying.

Spell.name: Obscuring Mist
Spell.short_description: Fog surrounds you.

Spell.name: Open/Close
Spell.short_description: Opens or closes small or light things.

Spell.name: Order's Wrath
Spell.area: nonlawful creatures within a burst that fills a 30-ft. cube
Spell.short_description: Harms and dazes chaotic creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt to chaotic outsiders increases to 1d10 points of damage per caster level (maximum 10d10) and the damage to other chaotic creatures increases to 1d12 points of damage per 2 caster levels (maximum 5d12).
