Spell.duration: instantaneous/1 round per HD of subject; see text

Spell.name: Firestream
Spell.duration: concentration, up to 1 round/level; see text
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 2d10 points of fire damage. Any creature that fails its saving throw also catches fire (Core Rulebook 444). The continuous line of fire pushes against all creatures, making them treat the spell's area as difficult terrain.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (4th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, you create a second line of fire using your other hand. If you overlap the lines, creatures in the overlap must attempt two saving throws and take the lower result, but don't take damage from both lines. You may stop either line of fire as a free action on your turn, but once you stop maintaining a line, you must cast mythic firestream again to recreate it.

Spell.name: Scorching Ash Form
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 3d6 points of fire damage. This otherwise makes the same changes as mythic gaseous form.
Spell.augmented: Augmented: If you expend two uses of mythic power, the target can shift into or out of scorching ash form as a move action.

Spell.name: Improve Trap
Spell.spell_level: antipaladin 2, druid 3, inquisitor 3, ranger 2, sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 3

Spell.name: Blood Blaze
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 2, antipaladin 1, cleric/oracle 2, magus 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, witch 2

Spell.name: Blood Scent
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 3, antipaladin 2, cleric/oracle 3, druid 3, inquisitor 3, ranger 2, sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 3

Spell.name: Enemy's Heart
Spell.duration: concentration/1 minute per HD of the subject; see text

Spell.name: Mighty Fist Of The Earth
Spell.mythic_text: Add your tier to the rock's attack roll and damage roll. Increase the critical multiplier of the attack by 1 (maximum x4).

Spell.name: Delay Disease
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 2, cleric/oracle 2, druid 2, inquisitor 2, paladin 2, ranger 2, witch 1

Spell.name: Sickening Strikes
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 2, antipaladin 2, druid 2, magus 3, ranger 4, witch 2

Spell.name: Theft Ward
Spell.mythic_text: Add your tier to the Perception check bonus. Add your tier to your CMD against disarm and steal combat maneuvers attempted against the item.

Spell.name: Damnation Stride
Spell.mythic_text: The burst of fire created reeks of sulfur and brimstone and also acts like stinking cloud (with the same duration as that spell and a separate Fortitude save).
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, you bring one unwilling adjacent creature with you. You may bring additional creatures, but each must be adjacent to you and each requires you to expend one additional use of mythic power. These creatures must first attempt a saving throw against the burst of flame and stinking cloud, then can attempt a Will saving throw to resist being teleported with you.

Spell.name: Shadow Anchor
Spell.mythic_text: Add your tier to the CMD of the shadow tether. A creature attempting to escape the shadow tether using planar travel or teleportation must succeed at a Will saving throw or be shunted to the Plane of Shadow instead of its intended destination, as if it had cast shadow walk (if the target could not reach the Shadow Plane from its current location using shadow walk, this aspect of the spell has no effect).

Spell.name: Covetous Aura
Spell.mythic_text: The duration of the covetous aura increases to 1 minute perlevel or until discharged. You may gain the benefits of spells of5th level or lower cast within the aura's area of effect. You cangain the effects of two separate spells, after which the mythiccovetous aura ends.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythicpower, the duration increases to 10 minutes per level or untildischarged. You may gain the benefits of spells of 7th level orlower cast within the aura's area of effect. When you gain thebenefit of a spell, the original spell is immediately targeted witha greater dispel magic spell at your caster level. If the dispelcheck succeeds, the spell ends for any of the original recipientsin the area of your covetous aura.

Spell.name: Lissalan Snake Sigil
Spell.duration: permanent until discharged; 1 day/level; see text

Spell.name: Shield Companion
Spell.spell_level: antipaladin 1, druid 1, paladin 1, ranger 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1

Spell.name: Tactical Formation
Spell.area: up to one creature/level, no two of which may be more than 30 ft. apart

Spell.name: Soothing Word
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 2, druid 2, inquisitor 2, paladin 2, ranger 3, witch 2

Spell.name: Vinetrap
Spell.area: radius spread of up to 10 ft./level, 90 ft. high

Spell.name: Dark-Light
Spell.area: Target living creatures without light sensitivity 20-ft.-radius burst

Spell.name: Enlarge Tail
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 1, antipaladin 1, druid 1, magus 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, summoner 1, witch 1

Spell.name: Lead Plating
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 3, cleric/oracle 2, druid 2, ranger 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, witch 2

Spell.name: Collaborative Thaumaturgy
Spell.spell_level: bard 3, cleric/oracle 3, druid 3, magus 3, summoner 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 3

Spell.name: Hallucinogenic Smoke
Spell.duration: 3 rounds/level or until discharged; see text

Spell.name: Ascension
Spell.mythic_text: If you expend one use of mythic power when casting this spell, the duration increases to 1 day per level, and you can use yourself as the focus for this spell instead of a lesser artifact. If you're the focus, the targets retain their mythic tier only while they're within 100 feet of you, and if you die, the spell immediately ends and all targets gain 1d4 permanent negative levels.

Spell.name: Deathless
Spell.mythic_text: If you expend one use of mythic power when you cast the spell, you become an anchor for the souls of you and your cohorts. The range increases to 30 feet, and instead of affecting one creature, it affects all allies within a 30-foot-radius emanation centered on you.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (8th): If you expend three uses of mythic power, the range increases to 1 mile, and the area to a 1-mile-radius emanation centered on you.

Spell.name: Lend Path
Spell.spell_level: bard 4, cleric/oracle 5, druid 5, magus 4, sorcerer/wizard 5, summoner 4, witch 5

Spell.name: Share Glory
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, cleric/oracle 3, druid 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner 2, witch 3

Spell.name: Borrowed Time
Spell.mythic_text: If you expend one use of mythic power, instead oftaking an extra swift action, you can take either an extra move oran extra swift action each round. You can use this extra swift actionto take two immediate actions between your turns; this consumesyour extra swift action in your next round. Each extra action youtake still deals damage to you as described above.

Spell.name: Elemental Bombardment
Spell.mythic_text: If you expend one use of mythic power, you cansummon a combination of differently sized elementals of upto two different types, as long as their total number does notexceed the original limit. For example, you could summon oneHuge air elemental and two Large fire elementals, or one Largewater elemental and six Medium earth elementals.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (9th): If you expend three uses of mythic power,you summon twice as many elementals as normal, each withthe advanced simple template.

Spell.name: Imbue With Flight
Spell.mythic_text: If you expend one use of mythic power, you double themaximum weight of the object you can imbue with flight. You canexpend additional uses of mythic power to increase the maximumsize of the object you can imbue with flight. Imbuing a Huge objectrequires two uses of mythic power, imbuing a Gargantuan objectrequires four uses, and imbuing a Colossal object requires eightuses. These costs include the expenditure to cast a mythic spell,and count toward doubling the weight limit of the spell.Two or more casters can cast this spell in concert to share themythic power cost. Each caster must expend an additional use ofmythic power to cooperate; this does not count toward the other costsor effects of the spell. The group chooses which caster has controlof the flight. As a full-round action, the controlling caster can cedecontrol to another caster involved in the original casting of the spell.

Spell.name: Soulreaver
Spell.mythic_text: You can expend one use of mythic power to raisecreatures killed by this effect as undead thralls. You can animatea number of Hit Dice worth of undead up to double your tier as ifyou had animated them with animate dead. The undead createdby this spell count toward the total number of Hit Dice worth ofundead you can control.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (8th): If you expend two uses of mythic power,you can raise slain foes as undead creatures chosen from thelist of undead for create undead. By expending three uses ofmythic power, you can select from the list for create greaterundead. The total number of Hit Dice worth of undead createdin this way can't exceed double your tier. Created undead arenot automatically under your control. If you are capable ofcommanding undead, you may attempt to command the undeadcreatures as they form.

Spell.name: Share Skin
Spell.duration: 1 hour/level or until you return to your body

Spell.name: Share Skin, Greater
Spell.duration: 1 hour/level or until you return to your body

Spell.name: Heavy Water
Spell.area: cylinder of water (5-ft. radius/level, 30 ft. deep)

Spell.name: Inner Focus
Spell.spell_level: adept 2, antipaladin 1, cleric/oracle 2, druid 2, inquisitor 2, paladin 1, ranger 1

Spell.name: Arbitrament
Spell.area: non-neutral creatures in a 40-ft.-radius spread centered on you

Spell.name: Dispel Balance
Spell.duration: 1 round/level or until discharged, whichever comes first
